hook.text: Kodak invented the digital camera in 1975. Then they buried it to protect film sales. They went bankrupt.

quiz.question: Why did Kodak go bankrupt despite inventing the digital camera?
options: They couldn't manufacture digital cameras cheaply enough
They buried the innovation to protect their profitable film business
